price: جادوگر آکر فرعون سے کہنے لگے کہ اگر ہم جیت گئے تو ہمیں کچھ انعام بھی ملے گا؟
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُواْ لِفِرۡعَوۡنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Urdu Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Urdu by Muhammad Ibrahim Gunakry. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falammā jāa al-saḥaratu qālū lifir'ʿawna a-inna lanā la-ajran in kunnā naḥnu al-ghālibīna
